Increasing the time between trades from 5 to 10 minutes will allow for better analysis and decision-making, potentially improving entry quality.
Allowing trades during sideways market conditions can capture potential movements that might otherwise be missed, especially if other conditions are met, thereby increasing trade opportunities.
